app_detail:
XON is a puzzle adventure game.
Explore a unique world and reveal its mysteries...


"It is visually dazzling, breathtaking, intensely atmospheric and maddeningly unusual" 4.8/5 pocketmeta.com

STUCK? Here is a walkthough video [WARNING, SPOILERS!]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWPYI0MZXSU

FREE - Episode One: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imagofx.xonep01
Episode Tree: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imagofx.XonEp3
Episode Four: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imagoFX.XonEp4
XON은 퍼즐 어드벤처 게임입니다.
독특한 세계를 탐험하고 신비를 드러내십시오 ...


"시각적으로 눈부시고 숨이 막히고 강렬하고 기막힌 일이다"4.8 / 5 pocketmeta.com

망할? 산책 비디오 [경고, 침입자]가 있습니다. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWPYI0MZXSU

무료 - 에피소드 1 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imagofx.xonep01
에피소드 트리 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imagofx.XonEp3
에피소드 4 : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imagoFX.XonEp4
